short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Microsoft Stream one click transcript extractor. Copy or download the transcript for easy summarization of meetings via AI (LLMs)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I made this extension because in some cases the author/uploader of the video on Microsoft Stream (set up in an enterprise environment) will disable your ability to Download the Video or the Transcript. You can still view the transcript though while using Microsoft Stream (Microsoft Office 365) and so why not easily and quickly download or copy that transcript so you can ask your favorite AI LLM to summarize the meeting for you.

This extension is open source and you can find it on GitHub - vullnetyy/stream-transcript-extractor-extension: 
https://github.com/vullnetyy/stream-transcript-extractor-extension
